summary: This document appears to be a forwarded email or email interface excerpt showing a message from Jeffrey Epstein to Lesley Groff on February 15, 2007, with a playful subject line referencing awaiting a picture and asking why the recipient wanted to hear from him before bed. It is part of a series of email communications.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email to Lesley Groff, with a playful tone asking about communication before bed and referencing awaiting a picture.

persons.name: Lesley Groff

events.title: Email from Epstein to Groff
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein sends an email to Lesley Groff with a subject line referencing awaiting a picture and asking about communication before bed.

keyFacts: Email communication between Jeffrey Epstein and Lesley Groff dated February 15, 2007.
Subject line suggests personal, informal interaction: 'Jeffrey is awaiting your picture!...and why were you hoping to hear from me before going to bed?? :)'
Document is part of a series of email communications from early February 2007, as indicated by the folder view listing multiple dates.
The email interface shows it was accessed or saved via a Yahoo Mail beta interface.
